metadata.title: CVE-2018-17794 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. There is a NULL pointer dereference in work_stuff_copy_to_from when called from iterate_demangle_function.

notes.note: mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2018-12697 to CVE-2018-12700

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
